ALAS2022-2022-052

Amazon Linux 2022 Security Advisory: ALAS-2022-052
Advisory Release Date: 2022-04-19 00:07 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2022-04-22 15:16 Pacific
Severity: Medium
References: CVE-2021-3997 
Issue Overview:

A flaw was found in systemd. An uncontrolled recursion in systemd-tmpfiles may lead to a denial of service at boot time when too many nested directories are created in /tmp. (CVE-2021-3997)


Affected Packages:

systemd


Issue Correction:
Run dnf update --releasever=2022.0.20220419 systemd to update your system.
